name: searchcountries
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool world_cities_and_countries.
Tool description: The fastest and most updated API with rich data that allow you search cities from more than 2 million records. Also allows to search country data with other additional info.
API description: API to search county based on the matching search keyword passed in url param.
NOTE: This API is case insensitive.
e.g. 
`/v1/locations/countries/uni`: This will return all the matching countries whose name starts from `uni` and their additional info.

keyword.description: The search keyword to find matching countries. The search is case insensitive.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return per page.

sortby.description:
Valid format to sort is `field:order`
e.g. `name:desc`, `alpha-2:asc`
where `asc` for sorting in ascending order
`desc` for sorting in descending order
